name: Field Guide - Liminal Space
author: Jacob Karpel, Jade Ripley, & Joseph Scanlon; LCP written by Andrew Hayden
description: The Field Guide to Liminal Space includes the manufacturers DOWNFALL Group; Marley, Oz, & Silver Lending & Consultations; and Magnum Opus Interstellar. It also features many new NPC classes, plus two new NPC templates and three 'Elite NPCs'.
